import { Box, Container, Grid, Typography, Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import React from "react"; import MyBackground from '../../static/images/hotelbg.jpg'; import Header from "../components/header"; import Footer from "../components/footer"; const Contact = () =>{ return( <>
